title: Apple has locked my Apple ID, and I have no recourse. A plea for help
author: parisidau
aiHeadline: Apple locks user out of their own account, because that's what happens when you trust a company that's never wrong.

title: Google removes Sci-Hub domains from U.S. search results due to dated court order
author: t-3
aiHeadline: Google takes down Sci-Hub from U.S. search results, proving that old court orders are still relevant, apparently.

title: VPN location claims don't match real traffic exits
author: mmaia
aiHeadline: VPNs promise to hide your location, but apparently, they're just hiding where they're not hiding you.

title: I tried Gleam for Advent of Code
author: tymscar
aiHeadline: Advent of Code gets a new twist with Gleam, because who doesn't want to make their coding challenges even more complicated?

title: Computer animator and Amiga fanatic Dick van Dyke turns 100
author: ggm
aiHeadline: Dick van Dyke turns 100, proving that age is just a number, unless you're trying to remember how to use TikTok.
